driver_photo_instruction1: 1- Stand directly in front of the camera with your full face visible.
driver_photo_instruction2: 2- Make sure the photo is clear.
driver_photo_instruction3: 3- Make sure the lighting is good and not too bright.
attach_driver_photo_instruction_1: 1- Stand directly in front of the camera with your full face visible.
attach_driver_photo_instruction_2: 2- Make sure the photo is clear.
attach_driver_photo_instruction_3: 3- Make sure the lighting is good and not too bright.
attach_driving_license_instruction_1: 1- We only accept the original document.
attach_driving_license_instruction_2: 2- Only the Saudi driver can make rides.
attach_driving_license_instruction_3: 3- The validity of the document is not expired.
attach_driving_license_instruction_4: 4- A clear photo must be uploaded.
attach_vehicle_registration_instruction_: 1- We only accept the original document.
2- Only the Saudi driver can make rides.
3- The validity of the document is not expired.
4- A clear photo must be uploaded.
5- Renew the mobility check and the insurance policy (if necessary) before uploading the document.
your_new_password_must_be_different: Your new password must be different from previously used password.
privacy_policy_agreement: I agree to the privacy and security policies
privacy_policy_intro: The app is committed to providing a safe and reliable environment for all users, whether employees or parents. Our policy includes the following:
data_privacy_point_1: . Personal data (such as name, mobile number, and geographic location) is collected and processed in accordance with data protection regulations.
data_privacy_point_2: . Advanced encryption technologies are used to ensure the confidentiality of data exchanged between users and the system.
data_privacy_point_3: . Data is not shared with any third party without explicit consent, unless necessary for safe operation or by competent authorities.
data_privacy_point_4: . Data is stored on secure servers and is constantly monitored, and strict access control policies are in place.
safety_point_1: . Children are transported by women drivers who are trained and qualified to handle young age groups, and whose backgrounds and security records have been thoroughly checked.
safety_point_2: . Each trip is broadcast via a camera installed on the dashboard to ensure transparency and the safety of the child and driver, and the broadcast ends at the end of the trip.
safety_point_3: . The trip tracking feature allows parents to track the trip in real time via the app.
safety_point_4: . Notifications are sent at the start of the trip, during the trip, and upon arrival.
obligations_point_1: . All users (employees and parents) are required to adhere to the usage policies and not misuse the information available to them.
obligations_point_2: . Each party is obligated to maintain the confidentiality of login data and not share it with third parties.
